lessonTitleText: An Angel Visits Mary and Joseph
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Who did God send to visit a young woman named Mary?
What did Gabriel say would happen to Mary?
answers: She would find lots of money

questions.text: What did Gabriel say about Mary's baby?
answers: Son of the Most High God, a forever king like David
A great soldier who would defeat Rome
A powerful teacher who would become famous

questions.text: Why did Mary ask, 'How can this happen?'
What did Gabriel say would happen to Mary to give her a child?
answers: The Holy Spirit would visit her
An angel would bring a baby from heaven
She would pray for many years

questions.text: What did Mary say about Gabriel's message?
answers: May it happen like you said it would
I need time to think about it

questions.text: When he saw Mary was pregnant, what did Joseph plan to do?

answers: An angel visited him in a dream
He ran away and was never seen again

questions.text: What did the angel say to Joseph?
answers: Marry Mary, her baby is from the Holy Spirit
Leave Mary and go far away
Go find another girl to Mary

questions.text: Jesus was the messiah. What does 'messiah' mean?
answers: A prophet who would speak God's words
An angel who would rule heaven
